title: PropertyConfigurationMostlyAllWritable (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK PropertyConfigurationMostlyAllWritable EXTENDS
PropertyConfiguration
Default implementation for a BACnet.IBACnetPropertyConfiguration to set mostly all properties to existent, writable, persistent.
Some exceptions are listed in mc_readOnlyProperties, mc_readOnlyObjectProperties, mc_nonPersistentProperties
